name: Introduction to Film
description: This course is an introduction to the basics of film studies, including film theory, analysis, and history.

name: Film Genres and History
description: This course covers various genres of film and their development over time, from the beginning of film to the present.

name: Cinematography
description: This course covers the art of cinematography, including lighting, composition, and camera movement.

name: Film Editing
description: This course covers the basics of editing, including assembling footage, transitions, and post-production.

name: Screenwriting
description: This course covers the basics of screenwriting, including structure, character development, and dialogue.

name: Advanced Film Theory and Analysis
description: This course covers advanced topics in film theory and analysis, including feminist film theory, postmodernism, and psychoanalytic film theory.
